headline: Wall Street notches new records as cool inflation bolsters interest rate cuts
summary: Inflation rose 3% year-over-year in September, slightly up from August’s 2.9% pace but below economist forecasts of 3.1%.

headline: Ford (F) Margin Expansion Reinforces Bullish Narratives Despite Revenue Headwinds
summary: Ford Motor (F) delivered a net profit margin of 2.5%, up from 1.9% a year ago, with EPS growing 33.4% over the past twelve months, far surpassing its average annual decline of -0.5% in the last five years. Share price stands at $13.84, which is above the estimated fair value of $8.64. Analysts expect revenue to decrease by 0.6% per year over the next three years, even as earnings are forecast to keep rising at 16.35% annually, a pace ahead of the broader US market. Amid improvements in...

headline: How major US stock indexes fared Friday, 10/24/2025
summary: Wall Street rose to records after an update said U.S. households are feeling a bit less pain from inflation than feared. The S&P 500 climbed 0.8% Friday and topped its prior all-time high set earlier this month. The Dow Jones Industrial Average jumped 1%, and the Nasdaq composite rallied 1.1%.
